p: The FRAP value was calculated from the calibration curve of FeSO 4 × 7H 2O standard solutions, covering the concentration range 100–1000 mmol/L and expressed as mmol Fe 2+/g extracts. The FRAP values were also estimated for positive controls (BHT and α-tocopherol) in the same manner. All spectrophotometric readings, in both antioxidant activity assays (DPPH and FRAP) were conducted on Evolution 60 UV/Vis Spectrophotometer (Thermo Fisher scientific, Waltham, MA, USA).
